# How to use window size

## create your app

```ts
import { useWindowSize } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { width, height } = useWindowSize()
        return `${width} / ${height}`
}
```

import { useWindowSize } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { width, height } = useWindowSize()
        return `${width} / ${height}`
}

<App />
